      • get

        public <V> V get(String urlStr,
        Map<String,String> params,
        Class<V> type)
      throws IOException
        Executes a HTTP GET request. The http response is expected to be a JSON representation of an object of the specified type. The object is parsed and returned.
        Parameters:
        urlStr - The URL of the request
        params - Parameters to include in the URL
        type - The expected type of the result
        Returns:
        An object of the expected type
        Throws:
        IOException - if the request could not be completed
